entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
